strings.name: English
strings.string:
You are in rome, 007.\You are currently on your way to a
meeting of a secret organization called "Spectre".
You can only pass the main entrance,
when you own the ring of the organization.
Your Walther PPK has 4 shots left and
you don't have any spare ammunition with you,
so think before you shoot.

Good Luck, 007.
